entry.value: CREATE TABLE ccep.reportingmetricssnapshot_new (accounttknid INT, metricgroup STRING, metrictopic STRING, metricname STRING, metricitem STRING, itemdisplayorder INT, value DECIMAL, unit STRING, valuetext STRING, viewname STRING, reportingperiod STRING, version_number INT) PARTITIONED BY (reportingperiodname STRING, version INT) ROW FORMAT DELIMITED FIELDS TERMINATED BY '|' STORED AS TEXTFILE LOCATION '/data/ccep/processed/reportingmetricssnapshot_new';

entry.value: WITH qtrly_benchmark_history AS ( SELECT h.benchmark_tkn_id , h.ReportingPeriod , --this should ve the partion quarter column h.benchmark_version_tkn_id AS use_version FROM ccep.union_quarterly_benchmark_version h INNER JOIN ccep.current_reporting_period crp ON h.ReportingPeriod = crp.ReportingPeriod ), baseBenchmarkSecurity AS ( SELECT qbh.ReportingPeriod , b.benchmark_tkn_id , bs.benchmark_version_tkn_id , b.rf_provider_tkn_id , CAST(bs.weight AS FLOAT) AS Weight , CAST(bs.shares AS FLOAT) AS shares , CAST(bs.market_value AS FLOAT) AS market_value , bs.security_tkn_id FROM ccep.union_benchmark b LEFT JOIN qtrly_benchmark_history qbh ON b.benchmark_tkn_id = qbh.benchmark_tkn_id LEFT JOIN ccep.union_quarterly_benchmark_security bs ON qbh.use_version = bs.benchmark_version_tkn_id WHERE ( bs.reportingperiod IS NULL OR qbh.reportingperiod = bs.reportingperiod ) ), CTE AS ( SELECT 0 AS Lev , qbh.ReportingPeriod , qbh.benchmark_tkn_id , qbh.security_tkn_id , qbh.rf_provider_tkn_id , NULL AS composition_benchmark_tkn_id , CAST(1.0 * qbh.Weight AS FLOAT) AS weight , CAST(qbh.shares AS FLOAT) AS shares , CAST(qbh.market_value AS FLOAT) AS market_value FROM baseBenchmarkSecurity qbh WHERE qbh.security_tkn_id IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT 1 AS Lev , qbh.ReportingPeriod , c.benchmark_tkn_id , qbh.security_tkn_id , qbh.rf_provider_tkn_id , c.composition_benchmark_tkn_id , CAST(qbh.weight * c.weight AS FLOAT) AS weight , CAST(qbh.shares * c.weight AS FLOAT) AS shares , CAST(qbh.market_value * c.weight AS FLOAT) AS market_value FROM baseBenchmarkSecurity qbh INNER JOIN ccep.union_benchmark_combo_composition c ON c.composition_benchmark_tkn_id = qbh.benchmark_tkn_id WHERE qbh.security_tkn_id IS NOT NULL AND c.benchmark_tkn_id IN ( SELECT benchmark_tkn_id FROM baseBenchmarkSecurity WHERE security_tkn_id IS NULL) ), Combined AS ( SELECT CTE.ReportingPeriod , CTE.benchmark_tkn_id , b.short_name AS benchmark_short_name , b.long_name AS benchmark_long_name , b.presentation_name AS benchmark_presentation_name , b.rf_provider_tkn_id , sum(CTE.weight) as weight, sum(CTE.shares) as shares, sum(CTE.market_value) as market_value, CTE.security_tkn_id FROM CTE INNER JOIN ccep.union_benchmark b ON CTE.benchmark_tkn_id = b.benchmark_tkn_id group by CTE.ReportingPeriod ,CTE.benchmark_tkn_id ,b.short_name ,b.long_name ,b.presentation_name ,b.rf_provider_tkn_id ,CTE.security_tkn_id ) SELECT bs.* FROM combined bs INNER JOIN (SELECT reporting_benchmark_tkn_id AS benchmark_tkn_id, ReportingPeriod FROM ccep.m_v_quarterly_account_benchmark UNION SELECT management_benchmark_tkn_id AS benchmark_tkn_id, ReportingPeriod FROM ccep.m_v_quarterly_account_benchmark) qab ON qab.ReportingPeriod = bs.ReportingPeriod AND bs.benchmark_tkn_id = qab.benchmark_tkn_id

entry.value: select crp.reportingperiod ,max(version) as current_version from ccep.ReportingMetricsSnapshot_new rms inner join ccep.current_reporting_period crp on rms.reportingperiodname = crp.reportingperiod group by crp.reportingperiod
